task_description:
# Enhanced Machine Reliability Scoring

Expand existing machine blacklist system to include reliability scores visible to users. Show uptime history, interruption rate, and community ratings for each GPU host.

## Rationale
Addresses Vast.ai pain point of variable machine quality. Builds on existing blacklist feature. Helps users make informed decisions and differentiates from raw marketplaces.

## User Stories
- As a user selecting a GPU, I want to see machine reliability scores so that I can avoid problematic hosts
- As a long-running training job owner, I want to prioritize stable machines even at slightly higher cost

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Reliability score (0-100) displayed for each available machine
- [ ] Score factors: uptime %, interruption rate, user ratings
- [ ] Historical data visible (last 30 days performance)
- [ ] Auto-sort by reliability option in machine selection
- [ ] Machines below threshold auto-excluded unless user opts in
